title: At a Restaurant: Greeting & Seating (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Greeting & Seating subcategory within At a Restaurant. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Which do you prefer, smoking or non-smoking?
cards.romaji: Kin'en, kitsuen, dochira ni shimasu ka?
cards.japanese: 禁煙、喫煙、どちらにしますか？
